Transmission electron microscopy.Description: Used to observe the morphology of the composites

Xray photoelectron spectroscopy.Description: Used to investigate the oxidation state of titanium

Dielectric and impedance spectroscopy an.Description: Dielectric measurements were performed using a dielectric analyzer

Thermogravimetric analysis.Description: Used to investigate the thermal stability of the composite

Dynamic mechanical analysis.Description: Tensile strength and ultimate elongation, as well as storage and loss modulus transitions were studied
